General.Name: Unic Technology
General.Description: UNIC Technology Corp. manufactures and supplies plastic materials in Taiwan. It offers engineering plastics, general-purpose plastics, functional materials, composite materials, and sustainable materials for use in projector TV, connector, automotive, back light unit, bottle, food package, film, 3D printing, TV, notebook PC, monitor/AIO, and charger/adapter applications. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 8, Ziqiang Street, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 236
